name: Dialog
description: Component for displaying custom content inside a popup dialog
note: Use alignment modifiers to control the dialog position (top, bottom, centerV, centerH, etc... by default the dialog is aligned to center)

props.name: onDismiss
props.description: Callback that is called after the dialog's dismiss (after the animation has ended).

props.name: direction
props.description: The direction from which and to which the dialog is animating \ panning (default bottom).

props.name: ignoreBackgroundPress
props.description: Whether or not to ignore background press.

props.name: modalProps
props.description: Pass props to the dialog modal
